insects.name: Bee
insects.behavior: Docile unless provoked. Can be domesticated for honey production.
insects.ecologicalImpact: Important pollinators for flowers and crops.

insects.name: Fly
insects.behavior: Often found near decaying matter. Can be captured for bait or study.
insects.ecologicalImpact: May spread diseases if not properly managed.

insects.name: Beetle
insects.behavior: Varied behaviors depending on species. Some are territorial or predatory.
insects.ecologicalImpact: Can affect plant health and ecosystem balance.

insects.name: Ant
insects.behavior: Highly social insects with complex behaviors. Can be studied or controlled.
insects.ecologicalImpact: Important for soil aeration and nutrient cycling.

insects.name: Wasp
insects.behavior: Aggressive if disturbed. Can be captured for study or used as biological control agents.
insects.ecologicalImpact: Predators of other insects. Can also pollinate flowers.
